name: oboro
normalized: okay!
begin the female ninja sisters murder match!

the corrupted human's dark desires swelled the entire assembly hall.
me and sakura drew out our ninja swords together, facing our blades.
we shortened the distance between us slowly.
when i fixed my eyes on sakura, she nodded silently.
this fight was for the benefit of surviving together.
anyway, with oboro and the audience, it was bad if the sisters didn't make them believe it was seriously a murder match.
as for the spectators, i think tricking them would be easy, but it was for the sake of making it look real to oboro, who stared with cold eyes at ringside.

name: asagi
normalized: （sakura, be serious.
don't worry about me, point your blade at me with the intent to kill）

normalized: taauu!

normalized: haauu!
our swords intersected mutually.
a metallic sound resounding as the ninja blades we held collided intensely.
with that appearance, the spectators grew suddenly excited.
sisters, not having any sort of reason for a murder match, excited their blood.
that's to say if it were any less than this show, they'd go drunk on madness.

name: asagi
normalized: …guu!
sakura's beheading attack was sharp and heavy, more than i expected.
while bearing with the burden weighing on my hands, i warded off sakura's decapitation attack.
from leaping high, and regaining my footing in the ring, i set up my katana for the sake of favoring an offensive.
only in that moment of events, the spectators raised voices of delight at losing sight of the movement when they blinked,
while on the lookout for sakura's next attack, i focused my look so as to appear unpretentious at oboro.
oboro merely gazed at our fight in silence.

name: sakura

normalized: hey now, being pushed upon by your younger sister.
that's no good, is it older sister

name: asagi
normalized: （even i didn't know she was training, did i）
